Minas Tirith (The War of the Ring)

wikitext.*:
'''Minas Tirith''' means "Tower of the Guard" in [[Sindarin]] (from ''[[minas]]'', "tower, citadel" and ''[[tirith]]'', "watch, guard") and can refer to: 
==Middle-earth==
* [[Minas Tirith (Beleriand)|Minas Tirith in Beleriand]], a fortress on the isle of [[Tol Sirion]] during the [[First Age]]
* '''[[Minas Tirith|Minas Tirith in Gondor]], capital of [[Gondor]] during the [[War of the Ring]], originally known as ''Minas Anor'''''
==Chapters==
* ''[[Minas Tirith (chapter)]]'', the first chapter of [[The Return of the King|Book V]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
* ''[[Minas Tirith (The War of the Ring)]]'', the third chapter of the third part (also called ''Minas Tirith'') of ''[[The War of the Ring]]''
==Adaptations and books==
* ''[[Minas Tirith (episode)]]'', the 16th episode of [[BBC|BBC Radio]]'s 1981 [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings'']], aired [[5 July|July 5]], [[1981]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (scene)]]'', the ninth scene of the theatrical edition of the [[2003]] film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'', and the eleventh scene in the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|extended edition]]
** ''[[Minas Tirith (soundtrack)]]'', a song on ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]''
*[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]
**''[[Minas Tirith (1988 book)]]'', a game supplement
**''[[Minas Tirith (1994 book)]]'', a game supplement

==Fandom==
* ''[[Minas Tirith (Cambridge smial)]]'', the Cambridge Tolkien Society
* ''[[Minas Tirith (journal)]]'', a journal of the [[Italian Tolkien Society]]
* The ''[[Minas Tirith Evening-Star]]'', a bulletin of the [[American Tolkien Society]]
* [[Minastirith.com]], a popular online forum

==Popular culture==
* [[Cruachan]], an Irish band formerly known as ''Minas Tirith''
* [[Helcaraxë (band)]], a US band formerly known as ''Minas Tirith''
* [[ERG]], a British band formerly known as ''Minas Tirith''
* [[Minas Tirith (album)]], a 1999 album by [[Druadan Forest (band)]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (1971 Oberon song)]]'', a [[1971]] song by [[Oberon (UK band)]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (Ainulindale Ensemble song)]]'', an orchestral jazz song by the Italian [[Ainulindale Ensemble]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (Cross Borns song)]]'', a [[2001]] song by [[Cross Borns]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (2004 Oberon song)]]'', a [[2004]] song by [[Oberon (US band)]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (Mickey Simmonds song)]]'', a [[2004]] song by [[Mickey Simmonds]]
* ''[[Minas Tirith (Nuclear Ramjet song)]]'', a [[2006]] song by [[Nuclear Ramjet]]
